intervention.intervention_name: neuro trax system and a neurology test.
intervention.description: the neurology will check the patience before and after tonsillectomy or adenotonsillectomy usung the neurotrax system, these parameters will be measured in this system : Non verbal memory, Go no go test, stroop interference, Visual spatial processing, Staged information processing speed, "catch" game, problem solving.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- children between 6-18 years old.
- children with enlarged tonsils or adenoids.
- a sleep lab test before the procedure.
Exclusion Criteria:
- children under 6 years old and above 18 years old.
- patience that treated in ADHD / ADDOR with other neurocognitive disorder.
